unnormalised: Yeah, I saw on the news that Lt. Gen. Rakesh Sharma is retiring next month. Apparently, Brig. Desai will be taking over. My chacha, Col. Verma, always said the army life is tough, especially for officers. Heard even Subedar Major Singh got a medal for his service at the border, good for him!
normalised: Yeah, I saw on the news that L-T General Rakesh Sharma is retiring next month. Apparently, Brigadier Desai will be taking over. My chacha, Colonel Verma, always said the army life is tough, especially for officers. Heard even Subedar Major Singh got a medal for his service at the border, good for him!
